name: Low Poly Survival Compasses - Forest Demo
name_original: Low Poly Survival Compasses - Forest Demo
description:
Low Poly Compasses contains a set of 3 low poly compasses with fully functioning compass pointers for your next survival or walking sim style game. It is available now for the Unity Asset Store.

Purchase here: http://u3d.as/18Dd
Website: http://www.2ginge.com
